title: Pixel 2 XL - Camera app crashes
content:
Hi
I have a Pixel 2 XL and I have been experiencing problems with my camera app.
It keeps crashing and it doesn't seem to a hardware problem. Because it works for a short time after a re-installation. Today, for example, I received the March update and the camera worked for a short time after the reboot but now it is crashing again.

Steps taken to solve this problem:  
Before the march update of today I tried a factory reset twice!  Once through the recover menu and the second time through the GUI.
I tried also cleaning the cash of the camera app
Rebooting the device many times
Closing and restarting the camera app.

Now I think the problems started after installing the update before the march update. I am not sure if this is cause but it might.
Anyway.... I need help! I miss using my camera... 

Thanks in advance for the advice.
Kind regards 
Jose Hoyos
